resources.string: Your device is currently on the network %1$s but your SmartBridge isn’t.
Your device is currently not on a WiFi network.
Go to settings > WiFi to switch to the same network as your SmartBridge

Ever thought about how much energy your home is using right now\? Or how much it costs to wash clothes or dishes, cook dinner, refrigerate food or turn up the heat\? Ynni lets you understand energy and makes it fun. Open Ynni and discover a whole new world full of energy.
It only takes a couple of minutes and then you can start enjoying the benefits of Ynni. Just type in your E-mail address.
Use your pin code to log in
Choose a 5-digit pin to log in easily
Please enter the full 5 digit code
Ynni likes to keep precise track of your electricity usage, so you have more insights. Fill out your monthly payment and your annual energy usage. Ynni will calculate your budget.
Ynni compares your electricity usage with other people in the test group. Are you an energy monster or an energy saver\?
Ynni compares your gas usage with other people in the test group. Are you an energy monster or an energy saver\?
This is your usage for hours on %1$s
This is your usage from %1$s to %2$s
This is your usage from %1$s to %2$s
This is your usage from %1$s to %2$s
Update the information you have shared with Ynni.
Wrong format, please enter a number
Take a challenge and earn awards\nGood luck!
Ynni occasionally sends you messages and alerts. If you don’t want to receive them, turn them off here.
Error occurred, please try again later.
Just input into your Ynni App the amount you pay your energy supplier each month. The App can then give you even better insight into your energy use.
Just input into your Ynni App the amount of direct debit you pay each month. The App can then give you even better insight into your energy use.
Great, you’ve filled out all your profile information. This gives us the opportunity to advise you even more precisely. That’s why you’ve earned a badge again! Well done!
Tell us more about the occupants
To advise you even better, we would like to know a bit more about the occupants in your house. You can add this additional information in your ‘profile’.
Tell us more about your property
To advise you even better, we would like to know a bit more about your property. Is it a rental house or are you a home owner\? You can add this additional information in your ‘profile’.
Tell us more about your appliances
To advise you even better, we would like to know a bit more about the appliances you use. Do you own a washing machine or dryer\? You can add this information in your ‘profile’.
Tell us more about the way you heat your house and water
To advise you even better, we would like to know a bit more about the way you heat your house and water. You can add this additional information in your ‘profile’.
Have you already checked your usage\?
Curious where you use all that electricity for\? Or on what days your usages is low or quite high\? You can check this in the Ynni app. Please, take a look.
How much energy do you use a year\?

Ynni can help you work out your electricity budget. So you then can see if you are on target with how much you spend on energy. Ynni needs a bit of information to do this as the App isn’t linked to innogy\'s billing system. So dig out your bill and see what you pay for each kWh of electricity, plus how much energy you use a year. If you are an online customer, you can also check this information in your account. Once you’ve input the information into the App, it can calculate your energy budget and you’ll have your second Ynni Reward Badge. Easy.
How much energy do you use a year\?

Ynni App can help you work out your energy budget so you can see if you’re spending more or less than your target. So just input what you pay for each kWh of electricity, plus how much energy you use a year – and you’ll have earned your second Ynni badge.
Take a look in the mirror

Are you using a lot of energy compared to the rest of your peer group or is it the opposite\? Compare your energy usage and then you’ll find out. It will give you a bit more insight on your usage. Good luck!
Took a look in the mirror yet\?
Have you already compared your energy usage with the rest of your peer group\? Take a look, you will be amazed!
How to get energized about energy saving\?
OK we admit it. Energy saving may not be the sexiest subject. But just think what you can do with all the money you save. So here’s Ynni’s five smart tips to save energy and save money:
How to get energized about energy saving\?
OK we admit it. Energy saving may not be the sexiest subject. But just think what you can do with all the money you save. So here’s Ynni’s five smart tips to save energy and save money:\n
Thanks for entering your e-mail address and pin-code. Ynni can tailor its service just for you. Great, now let’s get started.\n
Ynni has a new free upgrade.
Now it has even better features. Curious\? Of course you are. Go on, download the latest version now and all will be revealed.
Unfortunately, the connection between your smart-meter and the receiver unit has been lost.
Possibly the data connection is interrupted. Don\'t worry, your smart-meter won\'t be affected. We will help you to reconnect, just call 0800-8888863 or send an e-mail to pilotstudie@innogy.com
Ynni service temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or a problem with the system. Try again later.

Don’t worry. Your electricity won’t run out. Ynni has calculated that the electricity budget that you set yourself is running out. So it’s a good time to take another look at your energy consumption. How can you make smarter use of your energy\?

Don’t worry. Your gas won’t run out. Ynni has calculated that the gas budget that you set yourself is running out. So it’s a good time to take another look at your energy consumption. How can you make smarter use of your energy\?
Your energy budget has run out

Don’t worry. Your electricity won’t run out. Ynni has calculated that your electricity budget that you set yourself has run out. If it happens more often, it would be wise to increase your direct debit a bit, so you’ve no extra payments to make at the end of the year.
Your energy budget has run out

Don’t worry. Your gas won’t run out. Ynni has calculated that your gas budget that you set yourself has run out. If it happens more often, it would be wise to increase your direct debit a bit, so you’ve no extra payments to make at the end of the year.
The connection with your smart meter has been restored. Ynni will make sure everything is updated.
The data link with your household was interrupted temporarily. Data link has been restored. In case of prolonged interruption the energy consumption will be displayed shifted in time in the charts.
Thanks for entering your e-mail address. Ynni can tailor its service just for you. Great, now let’s get started.
How does Ynni help you budget\?

Thanks for providing your direct debit amount. You’ve earned a badge!\n\nEach month you pay your direct debit amount. This amount is fixed. To get more of an idea of what you can use, Ynni works with a monthly electricity budget. Therefore we worked out your direct debit by evening out seasonal and yearly fluctuations. Now you have a clear estimate of what you can use on a monthly basis.
Great, you’ve filled out all your profile information. This gives us the opportunity to advise you even more precisely. That’s why you’ve earned a badge again! Well done!
Thanks for providing what you spend on electricity. Now you’ll get a better insight of your energy usage. You’ve just earned a Ynni Reward Badge.

You have earned a badge! Alright, you know where you stand. Are you using less energy than the rest\? Keep it going! Are you a real energy monster…then maybe you can take a look around and see where you can save some energy.
How to get energized about energy saving\?
Thanks for checking out Ynni’s saving tips. Which one are you going to take on first\? Congratulations: you’ve just earned an Ynni Reward Badge.

How do you spend your evenings\? Watching TV\? On your computer\? Or both at the same time\? Plan one night a week to do something that doesn’t need electricity. Like sorting out your wardrobe or shed or other jobs you’ve put off. You’ll save energy, feel good – and you may even find that old T-shirt thas has been missed for ages.

Make movie nights extra cosy. Light some candles, close the curtains and cuddle up with everyone under a blanket. Then drop your thermostat down by one degree. It’ll save you an extra pounds per month. Plus, you probably won’t notice dropping the temperature by one degree during the daytime.

Did you know you can also control your boiler temperature\? Grab your boiler manual and see what the optimum temperature setting is. Too technical for you\? Just call our installers: +49 (0)231 438-26 98. They can help you optimize your boiler so you’ll maximize the money you save too.
Small loads could cost you loads

Some washing machines have a small load or half-load programme. Yes, they may use less energy and water. But washing two half loads uses up to twice the water and energy of one full load. So fill up your washing machine to the max.
Do you cook your meat, veg, rice and spuds in different pots on your stove\? Try a regular stir-fry instead and you’ll save a few euros per year.
Ynni cannot connect to your smart-meter. Is your receiver unit connected properly\?
Well done! You stayed within your electricity budget!
Well done! You stayed within your electricity budget! Congratulations! Did you pay extra attention to your electricity usage\? Or are you always this precise\?
Well done! You stayed within your gas budget!
Well done! You stayed within your gas budget! Congratulations! Did you pay extra attention to gas usage\? Or are you always this precise\?
The connection with your smart meter has been restored
We lost the connection%s but the connection with your smart meter has now been restored
The information which you have given to Ynni.
If you don\'t use the clock on your microwave, turn it off at the plug when you\'re not using it to cook.
Don\'t keep the oven door open for too long while you\'re using it
Rather than heating the pan on the hob, use an electric kettle to boil water for cooking
Always use the right size pan and cooking ring. And put a lid on to keep as much heat in as you can
Whenever you can, use a pressure cooker or microwave for cooking.
A steamer or segmented pan means you can cook different vegetables on one ring
When cooking on the hob, make sure the gas is only heating the bottom of the pan.
Switch your oven off sooner - many things will carry on cooking while the oven cools down
When boiling vegetables, only use just enough water to cover them
Use your toaster instead of making toast under the grill
Make sure fully loading washing machine
Use low temperature washing machine modes
Use different modes on washing machine
Don\'t dry clothes directly on radiators
Clean the filters regularly in your dryer
Purchase Eco Balls to use in the tumble drier. They make gaps in the washing to let the heat move around more freely - so clothes will dry quicker
Purchase a more efficient washing machine
Purchase a more efficient clothes dryer
Turn off lights when you do not need it
Use only one freezer and fridge
Load and unload your fridge or freezer as quickly as you can, so the doors aren\'t open too long
Plan what you want for a meal and get it out of the fridge or freezer in one go
Don\'t put hot food directly into your fridge. Let it cool down first, or your fridge will have to work harder
Check freezer and fridge door seals
Regularly dust the condenser coils at the back of your fridge and freezer
Purchase a more efficient fridge / freezer
Check heating timers set optimally / try heating for 30 minutes less
Turn heating off when on holiday
Use central heating rather than portable heaters
Don\'t block radiators with curtains or furniture
Close curtains at night when cold outside
Have a shower instead of a bath
Check hot water system for limescale
Did you notice the new pie chart\?
We are not only showing you your realtime usage. You can also see which activity is using electricity.
Did you notice the new tips\?
Check the section below your budget overview. We show you relevant tips based on the appliances you have. That gives you more information about saving energy!
Unfortunately we don’t have any tips for you at this moment. We’ll keep searching for you!
Below you can see exactly how much energy your appliances have used in euros. This will provide you an insight on where you can make some savings.
Please complete your profile. Your profile is complete\? Please be patient, we display your consumption data asap!
We are noticing a high usage
Something in your house is using a lot more energy than we are used to. Are you curious to what it is\? Look it up in your ‘actual usage’. We will show you what devices are on.
Give us your opinion and earn a badge!
Do you have time to answer some questions with ‘thumb up’ or ‘thumb down’\? Great, we are very curious about your opinion on the next 5 questions.
I would like to receive information about a good offer based on my profile.
If it turns out that one of my appliances is using a lot of energy, I would like to receive an offer for a more energy friendlier appliance.
If I’m exceeding my energy bundle, I would like to receive information on a good offer to lower my energy usage and save money!
Even though I’m not exceeding my energy bundle, I would still like to receive information on a good offer to lower my energy usage.
I would like to receive information on energy saving products.
Thanks for giving us your opinion!
You have answered all our questions, thank you very much. This way you have given us some more information to optimize this app. That\'s why you have earned a badge! Congratulations!

You’ve found the update screen! This screen will now also show you your activities and how much energy they will use (forecasted) or have used. Don’t forget to complete your profile or else you’ll see the wrong data or no data at all.
Unfortunately we don’t have any insights for you at this moment. We’ll keep searching for you!
Below you will find your appliances sorted on efficiency.

To calculate the efficiency values, we compare your electricity consumption with a typical consumption for your household size. The efficiency values are percentage values and will vary between 0 and 100%. 100% correspond to a very efficient appliance with high energy-saving behaviour and 0% to a very inefficient appliance with low energy-saving behaviour.
Get better and earn more badges
No points due to missing data

Each month you can participate in a competition. The target is to improve your appliance efficiency. This competition will refer to the appliance with the lowest efficiency in your household. The competition lasts for 28 days in which you can try to make your consumption more efficient. You will start with your individual efficiency value. The highest achievable efficiency is 100%.
How can I participate in a competition\?

You will receive a notification when the competition starts. At the beginning of the competition you will find out which appliance is chosen for this month. It is up to you on how to improve your efficiency. Our recommendations and tips will help you!
What is happening in the following months\?

Each month there will be a new competition! Your efficiency improvement will be calculated monthly in comparison to other users, that means: if you are not pleased with your score, you still have the chance to improve it next month! In case you cannot finish the competition (e.g. due to missing data), you can participate in another one next month!
Connect with Ynni in a few steps
During the setup process you will be guided along the following steps:
Connect your phone to the receiver unit
Connect the receiver to your WiFi network
Reconnect your phone to your home network
After these steps the receiver unit is setup and you can continue with your profile setup
Connect your phone to the receiver unit
To enable the connection, you need to temporarily connect to the \"MeDa-at-Home\" WiFi network. If you are using an Android Smartphone, make sure to deactivate the Smart Network Switch.
2. On the back of the SmartBridge you’ll find information needed to connect
3. The SSID is sbwf- plus the last four characters of your MAC address\n - This is always uppercase -
4. The password is sbwf- plus the SmartBridge shortcode\n - This is case-sensitive -
Choose your home network to connect with the receiver unit
The receiver unit is now connected to your phone
You will now reconnect this phone to your home network.
We are verifying the connection between your home network and the receiver unit
We need this to connect the receiver unit to this network
No points due to missing data
Connect your receiver unit to your wireless network at home.

Once you upgrade your App you can use a bunch of new functionalities and have a look at your data from anywhere you want. This can be very convenient if you are on the road and still want to have an overview. Check it out!

You have the opportunity to expand your app by adding new features! Compare your electricity consumption with the consumption of other Ynni users, check the consumption of each appliance and participate in competitions! Check our preview to see what is possible! \nIn order to activate these features, we need your permission. Please read the terms of use.

Ynni shows you the consumption of each appliance and calculates its efficiency. Click here to find out how it works.
You are the leader! Now you know your overall consumption, your appliance-based consumption and how the efficiency calculation works. We cannot offer you diamonds but a badge for sure!\n
With Ynni you can save money more easily. You can get insights on your energy data but also have a look on how you do compared to similar households. Activate the features and have a look!

Your energy data should be even more tangible! There are different situation in the daily life that require different amounts of electricity. You want to know how much you spend for doing the laundry\? No problem with this feature! Also we provide you with some tips to save even more!
Use this feature to check the consumption and costs of your appliances! Discover the appliance that need the most!
An efficient use of your appliance can make you successful! Enter a competition and be better than other users!

At the gym, your office or on vacation; with the upgrade you can use Ynni everywhere and always have a look at your energy data. Great, right\? Impress your friends and family with this new technology!
Response for agreement failed and upgrade is not possible at the moment.
Please accept terms of use to upgrade.
Thank you for upgrading. Now you can explore the new features. Have fun!\n
Upgrade your App and check out new features
Are you ready for the competition\?\n

This month we challenge you to improve your %s efficiency! Are you ready\? You will receive points for improving. Once all 5 competition are done, you can convert your points into an Amazon voucher. Save energy and earn a reward! Let\'s start! \n

This month we challenge you to improve your %s efficiency! Are you ready\? Have a look at how you are doing compared to other Ynni users. This may help you to develop a better understanding of your consumption.\n

This month we challenge you to improve your efficiency! Are you ready\? You will receive points for improving. Once all 5 competitions are done, you can convert your points into an Amazon voucher. Save energy and earn a reward! Have a look at how you are doing compared to other Ynni users. This may help you to develop a better understanding of your consumption.
Make sure to complete your profile!\n
Click here for more information on the competition\n

Your voucher can be created once you completed the last competition!

Answer some questions and see what others think!

Each month we ask you questions on energy and everyday life. There are different kinds of question types. Once you answered the question, you can also see what others answered! Simply try it! For each quiz you can earn a batch. Have fun!
Ahh, you are back to continue the Quiz! Have fun!

Every month we ask you different questions on energy and life. Once you answered the question, you can also see what others answered! Don\'t be sad, if you get something wrong! For each quiz you can earn a batch. Have fun!
Until the next month starts, you can always return to where you left off. Simply click on the quiz button on the dashboard, or open your inbox message to continue playing.
Super, you completed this quiz successfully and earned yourself a badge! \n We hope your stay motivated for the next month! Oh, and don\'t forget to defrost your freezer!

Your competitions can be affected by a change in the amount of your present appliances or your household size. Try to avoid changes in order to secure your latest status of the challenge. For more information, please have a look at the infobar in the about section of the competitions.
Did you notice the new pie chart\?
We are not only showing you your realtime usage. You can also see which activity is using electricity or gas.
Did you notice the new tips\?
Click on one of the activities in your pie chart. For example ‘Cooking’. We then show you a relevant tip. That gives you more information about saving energy on that specific activity.
Give us your opinion and earn a badge!
Do you have time to answer some questions with ‘thumb up’ or ‘thumb down’. Great, we are very curious about your opinion on the next 5 questions.
The competition starts today. Get ready!\n
We will give you a weekly update on your efficiency improvement. Your efficiency improvement is the difference between the efficiency from this month and the last one. Good luck!
Click here for more information on the competition\n
The latest competition week is over!
